scripts.clean:reports: if exist mochawesome-report rmdir /S /Q mochawesome-report && mkdir mochawesome-report && mkdir mochawesome-report\HTMLReport
scripts.generate:html:report: npm run merge:reports && npm run create:html:report
scripts.chrome: npm install && npm run clean:reports && cypress run --browser chrome & npm run generate:html:report
scripts.ff: npm install && npm run clean:reports && cypress run --browser firefox & npm run generate:html:report
